Metadata: Chemoenzymatic synthesis of peptidyl 3,4- dihydroxyphenyl​alanine for structure activity relationships in marine invertebrate polypeptides

A new method for hydroxylating tyrosine-​containing sequences in polypeptides to peptidyl 3,4- dihydroxyphenyl​alanine using mushroom tyrosinase is described. The method involves incorporating borate into the reaction mixture to stop formation of an unwanted side product.
